body_html: A SavedModel includes checkpointed vars, so that comment refers to the component of the SavedModel that is checkpointed vars, which it inserts into the other component, which is the graph def. I don't think a checkpoint alone has enough information in it to produce a frozen graph currently. @gargn to confirm.

body: A SavedModel includes checkpointed vars, so that comment refers to the component of the SavedModel that is checkpointed vars, which it inserts into the other component, which is the graph def. I don't think a checkpoint alone has enough information in it to produce a frozen graph currently. @gargn to confirm.
